Title: MySure DocuSign Sample Application for Insurance
Description: A sample insurance application that demonstrates some common DocuSign API workflows including DocuSign eSignature, DocuSign Click, DocuSign Payments, and real-time status.
SandboxText: Get started with the DocuSign API today
Description2: With a developer developer account, you can test our APIs for free! Developer accounts do not expire and have Enterprise-level features enabled.
Features:
MySure features:

  • Send document for signature
  • Send from template
  • Embedded signing
  • Forms and form-field data
  • Real-time status
  • Custom branding
  • Document visibility
  • Signer attachment tabs
  • Calculated (formula) fields
  • Downloadable documents and audit trails
AboutDocuSign:
About DocuSign

  • More than 400 million users in 188 countries
  • More than 300,000 companies
  • More than 300,000 new unique users join The DocuSign Global Trust Network every day
  • More than 64% of documents are completed within one hour
  • DocuSign is available in 43 languages
